turn.7: What is the Fribourg school system like?
turn.8: The Canton of Fribourg school system provides one year of non-obligatory Kindergarten, followed by six years of Primary school.
turn.9: What are the different levels of schooling?
turn.10: This is followed by three years of obligatory lower Secondary school where the students are separated according to ability and aptitude.
turn.11: Is there a higher level of schooling?
turn.12: Following the lower Secondary students may attend a three or four year optional upper Secondary school.
